ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of THOMAS RAFFY of Moncton, New Brunswick, to be a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of New Brunswick, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on April 15, 2022.
